title: 091: Cloyster
author: Chris Taylor
description:
You can never know what lay inside this mystical shell…because it lacks description, but it does have bombs and diamonds and yeah….it’s super unspectacular.  

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron), [Aleksandar](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56emXYp1pHXL2E9SLcYisw), [Ethan](https://twitter.com/synspawn), [Paul](http://www.megatenmarathon.com)

For more episodes and the full ranking list visit [Magmar Sucks](http://www.magmarsucks.com) on the web.

For more on the Pokemon in this episode check out their [Bulbapedia page](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Cloyster)
